meanings.definition: a type of palm tree native to South America.
meanings.sent1: The piassavas swayed gently in the breeze.
meanings.sent2: The piassavas provided shade for the animals in the hot sun.
meanings.sent3: The monkeys played hide-and-seek among the piassavas.
meanings.sent4: The piassavas stood tall like guardians of the forest.
meanings.sent5: The vibrant green of the piassavas painted a beautiful scene in the jungle.

meanings.definition: the fibers obtained from the leaves of the piassava palm, used for making brushes and brooms.
meanings.sent1: She used piassavas to craft a sturdy broom for sweeping.
meanings.sent2: The piassavas were twisted into strong fibers for the brush.
meanings.sent3: The mischievous cat tangled itself in the piassavas while playing.
meanings.sent4: Her words were like piassavas, sweeping away all doubts and fears.
meanings.sent5: The piassavas bristles scrubbed the floor clean with ease.
